text.content: "I'm looking for a paper with the absolute lowest $\Delta C_p$ (Specific Heat change) at the seam. My mixture's particle density is non-uniform, leading to asymmetric burn kinetics in humid conditions. Which paper, out of your rice/hemp selection, best compensates for this random distribution? I'm sorry for the technicality, I've had too much free time to think about this."
